project.name: PeopleWare Utility Library I
project.description: In this project, code is gathered that actually should have been part of the JDK. These are small code snippets, sometimes static methods, sometimes OO classes that encapsulate algorithms or other tedious work that are often used in our Java programs. Since it is hard to get such code into the JDK, we take the stance that this code should actually be in the Apache Jakarta Commons library. As much as possible, we will mimic the code structure of Commons. We will try to get this code out of this library into Commons, but that will be a slow process in itself. Pieces of code that are moved out will become deprecated here. Code in this library should never, ever, depend on anything else than the JDK and (minimal) Commons libraries.
